= Planning your programs =

	* Use pseudocode
	* Use stepwise refinement

== Setting up the program ==

	1. Start with comments and #include files
		* Research any stl that will make life easier
	2. Initialize variables and constants
		* What type of containers will I need which ones will be constant which one changable
	
	3. Enter the main game  loop
		* Usually a while statemnt which continues until the player dies or exits

	4. Get players input
		* Game reacts to players decisions
		* Rewards for correct decisions
		* Penalities for incorrect choices

	5. End game
